isArray: The value must be an array.
isString: The value must be a string.
isNumber: The value must be a number.
isInt: The value must be an integer.
isEmail: The value must be a valid email address.
isURL: The value must be a valid URL.
isUUID: The value must be a valid UUID.
isDate: The value must be a valid date.
isBoolean: The value must be a boolean.
isIn: The value must be one of the following: {{options}}.
minLength: The value must be at least {{min}} characters long.
maxLength: The value must not exceed {{max}} characters.
length: The value must be exactly {{length}} characters long.
isPositive: The value must be a positive number.
isNegative: The value must be a negative number.
isMobilePhone: The value must be a valid phone number.
matches: The value does not match the required pattern.
min: The value must be greater than or equal to {{min}}.
max: The value must be less than or equal to {{max}}.
isAlpha: The value must only contain alphabetic characters.
isAlphanumeric: The value must only contain alphanumeric characters.
isHexColor: The value must be a valid hexadecimal color.
isPostalCode: The value must be a valid postal code.
isCurrency: The value must be a valid currency.
isEnum: The value must be one of the following: {{enumValues}}.
isDivisibleBy: The value must be divisible by {{divisor}}.
isInstance: The value must be an instance of {{className}}.
isNotIn: The value must not be one of the following: {{options}}.
isDateString: The value must be a valid date string.
isJSON: The value must be a valid JSON string.
isNotEmptyObject: The object must not be empty.
isEqual: The value must be equal to {{value}}.
